text: Eleanor Anne Maguire (27 March 1970 â€“ 4 January 2025) was an Irish neuroscientist. She was the professor of Cognitive Neuroscience at University College London. She was also a Wellcome Trust principal research fellow from 2007 until her death in 2025. Maguire died from cancer on 4 January 2025, at the age of 54. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in the United Kingdom Category:Irish scientists Category:Irish academics Category:Writers from Dublin Category:Neuroscientists
title: Eleanor Maguire
